titleStmt.title: Ecce homo, the little Parliament unbowelled with, the substance, quality, and disposition of the outward members, and inward faculties, vertues, and properties : the glory of the good ones, and sad condition of rotten back-sliders.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Henry, Ironmonger.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Jane Coe, and are to be sould at her house ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Henry Walker. cf. NUC pre-1956.
